00074 static char __egs_app_msg1[] = "EGS_Application::EGS_Application(int,char**):";
00075 static char __egs_app_msg2[] = "EGS_Application::initSimulation():";
00076 static char __egs_app_msg3[] = "EGS_Application::runSimulation():";
00077 
00078 static EGS_LOCAL bool __egs_find_pegsfile(const vector<string> &paths,
00079         const string &pegs_file, string &abs_pegs_file) {
00080     string pfile = pegs_file;
00081     if( pfile.find(".pegs4dat") == string::npos ) pfile += ".pegs4dat";
00082     for(unsigned int j=0; j<paths.size(); j++) {
00083         string this_pegs =!paths[j].empty() ? egsJoinPath(paths[j],pfile) : pfile;
00084         if( !EGS_ACCESS(this_pegs.c_str(),R_OK) ) {
00085             abs_pegs_file = this_pegs; return true;
00086         }
00087     }
00088     return false;
00089 }

00102 
00103 int EGS_Application::userScoring(int iarg) {
00104     if( a_objects ) {
00105         int early_return = 0;
00106         for(int j=0; j<a_objects[iarg].size(); ++j) {
00107             int res = a_objects[iarg][j]->processEvent((AusgabCall)iarg);
00108             if( res < 0 ) return res;
00109             if( res > 0 ) early_return = res;
00110         }
00111         if( early_return > 0 ) return early_return;
00112     }
00113     return ausgab(iarg);
00114 }
00115 
00116 void EGS_Application::checkEnvironmentVar(int &argc, char **argv,
00117         const char *n1, const char *n2, const char *env, string &var) {
00118     char *aux = getenv(env);
00119     if( aux ) var = aux; else var = "";
00120     getArgument(argc,argv,n1,n2,var);
00121     if( !var.size() ) egsFatal("%s\n  the environment variable %s is not set"
00122            " and it was not passed as argument\n",__egs_app_msg1,env);
00123     int n = var.size()-1;
00124     if( var[n] != '/' && var[n] != fs ) var += fs;
00125 }

00127 class EGS_LOCAL EGS_GeometryHistory {
00128 public:
00129     struct Step {
00130         EGS_Vector x, u;
00131         EGS_Float  twant, t;
00132         int        ireg, inew;
00133         Step() {};
00134         Step(int Ireg, int Inew, const EGS_Vector &X, const EGS_Vector &U,
00135             EGS_Float Twant, EGS_Float T) : x(X), u(U), twant(Twant), t(T),
00136             ireg(Ireg), inew(Inew) {};
00137         void show() const {
00138             egsWarning("old region=%d, position=(%g,%g,%g), "
00139               "direction=(%g,%g,%g) intended step=%g, new region=%d, "
00140               "step=%g\n",ireg,x.x,x.y,x.z,u.x,u.y,u.z,twant,inew,t);
00141         };
00142     };
00143 
00144     EGS_GeometryHistory(int N=2) : steps(new Step [N]), nsize(N), ns(0),
00145                                      wrap(false) {};
00146     ~EGS_GeometryHistory() { delete [] steps; };
00147     void  addStep(int ireg, int inew, const EGS_Vector &x,
00148                   const EGS_Vector &u, EGS_Float twant, EGS_Float t) {
00149         steps[ns++] = Step(ireg,inew,x,u,twant,t);
00150         if( ns >= nsize ) { ns = 0; wrap = true; }
00151     };
00152     void reportHistory() const {
00153         int nhave = wrap ? nsize : ns;
00154         egsWarning("\n************** Last %d geometry steps:\n",nhave);
00155         if( wrap ) {
00156             for(int j=ns; j<nsize; j++) steps[j].show();
00157         }
00158         for(int j=0; j<ns; j++) steps[j].show();
00159     };
00160 
00161     Step  *steps;
00162     int   nsize;
00163     int   ns;
00164     bool  wrap;
00165 };
00166 
00167 void EGS_Application::reportGeometryError() {
00168     ghistory->reportHistory();
00169 
00170     // check if we are over the tolerated limit for geometry errors
00171     run->geomErrorCount++;
00172     if (run->geomErrorCount > run->geomErrorMax) {
00173         egsFatal("\n\n******** Encountered %d geometry errors (maximum allowed is %d). \n \
00174         You can change this limit with the 'geometry error limit' run control input key. \n \
00175         Quitting now.\n", run->geomErrorCount, run->geomErrorMax);
00176     }
00177 }
00178 
00179 void EGS_Application::storeGeometryStep(int ireg, int inew,
00180        const EGS_Vector &x, const EGS_Vector &u, EGS_Float twant, EGS_Float t){
00181     ghistory->addStep(ireg,inew,x,u,twant,t);
00182 }

00184 EGS_Application::EGS_Application(int argc, char **argv) : input(0), geometry(0),
00185     source(0), rndm(0), run(0), last_case(0), current_case(0),
00186     data_out(0), data_in(0), simple_run(false), a_objects(0),
00187     ghistory(new EGS_GeometryHistory) {
00188 
00189     app_index = n_apps++;
00190 
00191     if( !active_egs_application ) active_egs_application = this;
00192     { for(int call=BeforeTransport; call<AfterTransport; call++)
00193         ausgab_flag[call] = true;
00194     }
00195     { for(int call=AfterTransport; call<UnknownCall; call++)
00196         ausgab_flag[call] = false;
00197     }
00198 
00199     //
00200     // *** get the name of this application
00201     //
00202     if( !getArgument(argc,argv,"-a","--application",app_name) ) app_name = egsStripPath(argv[0]);
00203     if( !app_name.size() ) egsFatal("%s\n   failed to determine application "
00204             "name from %s or command line arguments\n",__egs_app_msg1,argv[0]);
00205     //
00206     // *** make sure EGS_HOME is set.
00207     //
00208     checkEnvironmentVar(argc,argv,"-e","--egs-home","EGS_HOME",egs_home);
00209     app_dir = egsJoinPath(egs_home,app_name);
00210     //
00211     // *** make sure HEN_HOUSE is set.
00212     //
00213     checkEnvironmentVar(argc,argv,"-H","--hen-house","HEN_HOUSE",hen_house);
00214     //
00215     // *** check if there is an input file specified on the command line
00216     //
00217     getArgument(argc,argv,"-i","--input",input_file);
00218         //egsFatal("%s\n  no input file specified\n",__egs_app_msg1);
00219     //
00220     // *** create the name of the working directory
00221     //
00222     char buf[512];
00223     sprintf(buf,"egsrun_%d_",egsGetPid());
00224     run_dir = buf;
00225     if( input_file.size() > 0 ) { run_dir += input_file; run_dir += '_'; }
00226     else run_dir += "_noinput_";
00227     run_dir += egsHostName();
00228 
00229     //
00230     // *** check if there is a PEGS file specified on the command line
00231     //
00232     is_pegsless= false;
00233     if(!getArgument(argc,argv,"-p","--pegs-file",pegs_file)) is_pegsless= true;
00234         //gsFatal("%s\n  no PEGS file specified\n",__egs_app_msg1);
00235 
00236     //
00237     // *** check if the pegs file exists.
00238     //
00239     if( pegs_file.size() > 0 ) {
00240         string pdirs = egsJoinPath("pegs4","data");
00241         vector<string> pegs_paths; pegs_paths.push_back("");
00242         pegs_paths.push_back(egsJoinPath(egs_home,pdirs));
00243         pegs_paths.push_back(egsJoinPath(hen_house,pdirs));
00244         if( !__egs_find_pegsfile(pegs_paths,pegs_file,abs_pegs_file) )
00245             egsFatal("%s\n  the pegs file %s does not exist or is not "
00246                "readable\n",__egs_app_msg1,pegs_file.c_str());
00247     }
00248 
00249     //
00250     // *** check if the input file exists.
00251     //
00252     string ifile;
00253     if( input_file.size() > 0 ) {
00254         ifile = egsJoinPath(app_dir,input_file);
00255         if( ifile.find(".egsinp") == string::npos ) ifile += ".egsinp";
00256         if( EGS_ACCESS(ifile.c_str(),R_OK) )
00257             egsFatal("%s\n  the input file %s does not exist or is not "
00258                   "readable\n",__egs_app_msg1,ifile.c_str());
00259     }
00260 
00261     //
00262     // *** set the output file
00263     //
00264     if( !getArgument(argc,argv,"-o","--output",output_file) )
00265           output_file = input_file;
00266     if( !output_file.size() ) output_file = "test";
00267     //
00268     // *** see if a batch run.
00269     //
00270     batch_run = false;
00271     for(int j=1; j<argc; j++) {
00272         string tmp = argv[j];
00273         if( tmp == "-b" || tmp == "--batch" ) {
00274             batch_run = true;
00275             //for(int i=j; i<argc-1; i++) argv[i] = argv[i+1];
00276             //argc--;
00277             break;
00278         }
00279     }
00280     //
00281     // *** see if parallel run.
00282     //
00283     string npar, ipar; n_parallel = i_parallel = 0;
00284     bool have_np = getArgument(argc,argv,"-P","--parallel",npar);
00285     bool have_ip = getArgument(argc,argv,"-j","--job",ipar);
00286     if( have_np && have_ip ) {
00287         n_parallel = ::strtol(npar.c_str(),0,10);
00288         i_parallel = ::strtol(ipar.c_str(),0,10);
00289         if( n_parallel < 0 ) {
00290             egsWarning("%s\n  invalid -P argument %d\n",__egs_app_msg1,
00291                     n_parallel); n_parallel = 0;
00292         }
00293         if( i_parallel < 0 ) {
00294             egsWarning("%s\n  invalid -j argument %d\n",__egs_app_msg1,
00295                     i_parallel); i_parallel = 0; n_parallel = 0;
00296         }
00297         if( i_parallel > n_parallel ) {
00298             egsWarning("%s\n  job number (%d) can not be larger than number"
00299                 " of parallel jobs(%d). Turning off parallel option\n",
00300                 __egs_app_msg1,i_parallel,n_parallel);
00301             n_parallel = 0; i_parallel = 0;
00302         }
00303     }
00304     else if ( have_np || have_ip )
00305         egsWarning("%s\n  to specify a parallel run you need both,"
00306                 " the -P and -j command line options\n",__egs_app_msg1);
00307 
00308     //
00309     // *** see if user wants simple job control
00310     //
00311     {
00312     for(int j=1; j<argc; j++) {
00313         string tmp = argv[j];
00314         if( tmp == "-s" || tmp == "--simple-run" ) {
00315             simple_run = true;
00316             //for(int i=j; i<argc-1; i++) argv[i] = argv[i+1];
00317             //argc--;
00318             break;
00319         }
00320     }
00321     }
00322 
00323     final_output_file = output_file;
00324     if( i_parallel > 0 && n_parallel > 0 ) {
00325         batch_run = true;
00326         char buf[1024]; sprintf(buf,"%s_w%d",output_file.c_str(),i_parallel);
00327         output_file = buf;
00328     }
00329 
00330     //
00331     // *** read the input
00332     //
00333     input = new EGS_Input;
00334     if( ifile.size() > 0 ) {
00335         if( input->setContentFromFile(ifile.c_str()) )
00336             egsFatal("%s\n  error while reading input file %s\n",
00337                     __egs_app_msg1,ifile.c_str());
00338     }
00339 
00340 }
00341 
00342 bool EGS_Application::getArgument(int &argc, char **argv,
00343         const char *name1, const char *name2, string &arg) {
00344     string n1(name1), n2(name2);
00345     for(int j=1; j<argc-1; j++) {
00346         if( n1 == argv[j] || n2 == argv[j] ) {
00347             arg = argv[j+1];
00348             //for(int i=j; i<argc-2; i++) argv[i] = argv[i+2];
00349             //argc -= 2;
00350             return true;
00351         }
00352     }
00353     return false;
00354 }
00355 
00356 string EGS_Application::constructIOFileName(const char *extension,
00357         bool with_run_dir) const {
00358     string iofile = with_run_dir ? egsJoinPath(app_dir,run_dir) : app_dir;
00359     iofile = egsJoinPath(iofile,output_file);
00360     if( extension ) iofile += extension;
00361     return iofile;
00362 }
00363 
00364 int EGS_Application::outputData() {
00365 
00366     if( data_out ) delete data_out;
00367     string ofile = constructIOFileName(".egsdat",true);
00368     /*
00369     string ofile = egsJoinPath(app_dir,run_dir);
00370     ofile = egsJoinPath(ofile,output_file);
00371     ofile += ".egsdat";
00372     */
00373     data_out = new ofstream(ofile.c_str());
00374     if( !(*data_out) ) {
00375         egsWarning("EGS_Application::outputData: failed to open %s "
00376                 "for writing\n",ofile.c_str()); return 1;
00377     }
00378     if( !run->storeState(*data_out) ) return 2;
00379     if( !egsStoreI64(*data_out,current_case) ) return 3;
00380     (*data_out) << endl;
00381     if( !rndm->storeState(*data_out) ) return 4;
00382     if( !source->storeState(*data_out) ) return 5;
00383     for(int j=0; j<a_objects_list.size(); ++j) {
00384         if (!a_objects_list[j]->storeState(*data_out)) return 6;
00385     }
00386     return 0;
00387 }
00388 
00389 int EGS_Application::readData() {
00390     if( data_in ) delete data_in;
00391     string ifile = constructIOFileName(".egsdat",false);
00392     /*
00393     string ifile = egsJoinPath(app_dir,output_file);
00394     ifile += ".egsdat";
00395     */
00396     data_in = new ifstream(ifile.c_str());
00397     if( !(*data_in) ) {
00398         egsWarning("EGS_Application::readData: failed to open %s "
00399                 "for reading\n",ifile.c_str()); return 1;
00400     }
00401     if( !run->setState(*data_in) ) return 2;
00402     if( !egsGetI64(*data_in,current_case) ) return 3;
00403     last_case = current_case;
00404     if( !rndm->setState(*data_in) ) return 4;
00405     if( !source->setState(*data_in) ) return 5;
00406     for(int j=0; j<a_objects_list.size(); ++j) {
00407         if (!a_objects_list[j]->setState(*data_in)) return 6;
00408     }
00409     return 0;
00410 }
00411 
00412 void EGS_Application::resetCounter() {
00413     last_case = 0; current_case = 0;
00414     run->resetCounter();
00415     rndm->resetCounter();
00416     source->resetCounter();
00417     for(int j=0; j<a_objects_list.size(); ++j) {
00418         a_objects_list[j]->resetCounter();
00419     }
00420 
00421 }
00422 
00423 int EGS_Application::addState(istream &data) {
00424     if( !run->addState(data) ) return 1;
00425     EGS_I64 tmp_case; if( !egsGetI64(data,tmp_case) ) return 2;
00426     current_case += tmp_case; last_case = current_case;
00427     if( !rndm->addState(data) ) return 3;
00428     if( !source->addState(data) ) return 4;
00429     for(int j=0; j<a_objects_list.size(); ++j)
00430         if (!a_objects_list[j]->addState(data)) return 5;
00431     return 0;
00432 }
00433 
00434 int EGS_Application::combineResults() {
00435     egsInformation(
00436 "\n                      Suming the following .egsdat files:\n"
00437 "=======================================================================\n");
00438     char buf[512]; resetCounter();
00439     EGS_Float last_cpu = 0; EGS_I64 last_ncase = 0;
00440     int ndat = 0; bool ok = true;
00441     for(int j=1; j<500; j++) {
00442         sprintf(buf,"%s_w%d.egsdat",output_file.c_str(),j);
00443         string dfile = egsJoinPath(app_dir,buf);
00444         ifstream data(dfile.c_str());
00445         if( data ) {
00446             int err = addState(data); ++ndat;
00447             if( !err ) {
00448                 EGS_I64 ncase = run->getNdone();
00449                 EGS_Float cpu = run->getCPUTime();
00450                 egsInformation("%2d %-30s ncase=%-14lld cpu=%-11.2f\n",
00451                         ndat,buf,ncase-last_ncase,cpu-last_cpu);
00452                 last_ncase = ncase; last_cpu = cpu;
00453             }
00454             else {
00455                 ok = false; egsWarning("%2d %-30s error %d\n",ndat,buf,err);
00456             }
00457         }
00458     }
00459     if( ndat > 0 ) {
00460         egsInformation(
00461 "=======================================================================\n");
00462         egsInformation("%40s%-14lld cpu=%-11.2f\n\n","Total ncase=",last_ncase,
00463                 last_cpu);
00464     }
00465     if( ndat > 0 ) return ok ? 0 : -1; else return 1;
00466 }
00467 
00468 EGS_I64 EGS_Application::randomNumbersUsed() const {
00469     if( !rndm ) return 0;
00470     return rndm->numbersUsed();
00471 }
00472 
00473 int EGS_Application::initGeometry() {
00474     if( !input ) return -1;
00475     //if( geometry ) { delete geometry; geometry = 0; }
00476     EGS_BaseGeometry::setActiveGeometryList(app_index);
00477     geometry = EGS_BaseGeometry::createGeometry(input);
00478     if( !geometry ) return 1;
00479     geometry->ref();
00480     return 0;
00481 }
00482 
00483 int EGS_Application::initSource() {
00484     if( !input ) return -1;
00485     //if( source ) { delete source; source = 0; }
00486     source = EGS_BaseSource::createSource(input);
00487     if( !source ) return 1;
00488     source->ref();
00489     return 0;
00490 }
00491 
00492 int EGS_Application::initRunControl() {
00493     if( run ) delete run;
00494     if( simple_run ) run = new EGS_RunControl(this);
00495     else run = EGS_RunControl::getRunControlObject(this);
00496     if( !run ) return 1;
00497     return 0;
00498 }
00499 
00500 int EGS_Application::initRNG() {
00501     if( rndm ) delete rndm;
00502     int sequence = 0;
00503     if( n_parallel > 0 && i_parallel > 0 ) sequence = i_parallel - 1;
00504     if( input ) rndm = EGS_RandomGenerator::createRNG(input,sequence);
00505     if( !rndm ) {
00506         egsWarning("EGS_Application::initRNG(): using default RNG\n");
00507         rndm = EGS_RandomGenerator::defaultRNG(sequence);
00508     }
00509     if( !rndm ) {
00510         egsWarning("EGS_Application::initRNG(): got null RNG?\n");
00511         return 1;
00512     }
00513     return 0;
00514 }
00515 
00516 int EGS_Application::initSimulation() {
00517     //if( !input ) { egsWarning("%s no input\n",__egs_app_msg2); return -1; }
00518     egsInformation("In EGS_Application::initSimulation()\n");
00519     int err; bool ok = true;
00520     err = initGeometry();
00521     if( err ) {
00522         egsWarning("\n\n%s geometry initialization failed\n",__egs_app_msg2);
00523         ok = false;
00524     }
00525     err = initSource();
00526     if( err ) {
00527         egsWarning("\n\n%s source initialization failed\n",__egs_app_msg2);
00528         ok = false;
00529     }
00530     err = initRNG();
00531     if( err ) {
00532         egsWarning("\n\n%s RNG initialization failed\n",__egs_app_msg2);
00533         ok = false;
00534     }
00535     err = initRunControl();
00536     if( err ) {
00537         egsWarning("\n\n%s run control initialization failed\n",__egs_app_msg2);
00538         ok = false;
00539     }
00540     if( !ok ) return 1;
00541     err = initEGSnrcBackEnd();
00542     if( err ) {
00543         egsWarning("\n\n%s back-end initialization failed\n",__egs_app_msg2);
00544         return 2;
00545     }
00546     describeUserCode();
00547     err = initCrossSections();
00548     if( err ) {
00549         egsWarning("\n\n%s cross section initialization failed\n",__egs_app_msg2);
00550         return 3;
00551     }
00552     err = initScoring();
00553     if( err ) {
00554         egsWarning("\n\n%s scoring initialization failed with status %d\n",
00555                 __egs_app_msg2,err);
00556         return 4;
00557     }
00558     initAusgabObjects();
00559     //describeSimulation();
00560     return 0;
00561 }
00562 
00563 void EGS_Application::setSimulationChunk(EGS_I64 nstart, EGS_I64 nrun) {
00564     if( source ) source->setSimulationChunk(nstart,nrun);
00565 }
00566 
00567 void EGS_Application::describeSimulation() {
00568     if( !geometry && !source ) return;
00569     egsInformation("\n\n");
00570     if( geometry ) geometry->printInfo();
00571     if( source ) egsInformation("\n\nThe simulation uses the following source:"
00572                                   "\n========================================="
00573           "\n %s\n\n\n",source->getSourceDescription());
00574     if( rndm ) { rndm->describeRNG(); egsInformation("\n\n"); }
00575     if( a_objects_list.size() > 0 ) {
00576         egsInformation("The following ausgab objects are included in the simulation\n");
00577         egsInformation("===========================================================\n\n");
00578         for(int j=0; j<a_objects_list.size(); ++j)
00579             egsInformation("%s",a_objects_list[j]->getObjectDescription());
00580         egsInformation("\n\n");
00581     }
00582 }
00583 
00584 int EGS_Application::runSimulation() {
00585     bool ok = true;
00586     if( !geometry ) {
00587         egsWarning("%s no geometry\n",__egs_app_msg3); ok = false;
00588     }
00589     if( !source ) {
00590         egsWarning("%s no source\n",__egs_app_msg3); ok = false;
00591     }
00592     if( !rndm ) {
00593         egsWarning("%s no RNG\n",__egs_app_msg3); ok = false;
00594     }
00595     if( !run ) {
00596         egsWarning("%s no run control object\n",__egs_app_msg3); ok = false;
00597     }
00598     if( !ok ) return 1;
00599 
00600     int start_status = run->startSimulation();
00601     if( start_status ) {
00602         if( start_status < 0 )
00603            egsWarning("\n%s failed to start the simulation\n\n",__egs_app_msg3);
00604         return start_status;
00605     }
00606 
00607     EGS_I64 ncase; bool next_chunk = true;
00608 
00609     while( next_chunk && (ncase = run->getNextChunk()) > 0 ) {
00610 
00611         egsInformation("\nRunning %lld histories\n",ncase);
00612         double f,df;
00613         if( run->getCombinedResult(f,df) ) {
00614             char c = '%';
00615             egsInformation("    combined result from this and other parallel"
00616                   " runs: %lg +/- %7.3lf%c\n\n",f,df,c);
00617         }
00618         else egsInformation("\n");
00619         int nbatch = run->getNbatch();
00620         EGS_I64 ncase_per_batch = ncase/nbatch;
00621         if( !ncase_per_batch ) {
00622             ncase_per_batch = 1; nbatch = ncase;
00623         }
00624         for(int ibatch=0; ibatch<nbatch; ibatch++) {
00625             if( !run->startBatch(ibatch,ncase_per_batch) ) {
00626                 egsInformation("  startBatch() loop termination\n");
00627                 next_chunk = false; break;
00628             }
00629             for(EGS_I64 icase=0; icase<ncase_per_batch; icase++) {
00630                 if( simulateSingleShower() ) {
00631                     egsInformation("  simulateSingleShower() "
00632                             "loop termination\n");
00633                     next_chunk = false; break;
00634                 }
00635             }
00636             if( !next_chunk ) break;
00637             if( !run->finishBatch() ) {
00638                 egsInformation("  finishBatch() loop termination\n");
00639                 next_chunk = false; break;
00640             }
00641         }
00642     }
00643     // call this from within finishSimulation()
00644     //run->finishSimulation();
00645     return 0;
00646 }
00647 
00648 int EGS_Application::simulateSingleShower() {
00649     int ireg; int ntry = 0; last_case = current_case;
00650     do {
00651         ntry++;
00652         if( ntry > 100000 ) {
00653             egsWarning("EGS_Application::simulateSingleShower(): no particle"
00654                   " from the source has entered the geometry after 100000"
00655                   " attempts\n"); return 1;
00656         }
00657         current_case =
00658             source->getNextParticle(rndm,p.q,p.latch,p.E,p.wt,p.x,p.u);
00659         ireg = geometry->isWhere(p.x);
00660         if( ireg < 0 ) {
00661             EGS_Float t = 1e30; ireg = geometry->howfar(ireg,p.x,p.u,t);
00662             if( ireg >= 0 ) p.x += p.u*t;
00663         }
00664     } while ( ireg < 0 );
00665     p.ir = ireg;
00666     int err = startNewShower(); if( err ) return err;
00667     err = shower(); if( err ) return err;
00668     return finishShower();
00669 }
00670 
00671 int EGS_Application::startNewShower() {
00672     if( current_case != last_case ) {
00673         for(int j=0; j<a_objects_list.size(); ++j)
00674             a_objects_list[j]->setCurrentCase(current_case);
00675     }
00676     return 0;
00677 }
00678 
00679 EGS_Application::~EGS_Application() {
00680     if( rndm ) delete rndm;
00681     if( run ) delete run;
00682     if( input ) delete input;
00683     EGS_Object::deleteObject(source);
00684     if( geometry ) {
00685         if( !geometry->deref() ) {
00686             EGS_Application *app = active_egs_application;
00687             active_egs_application = this;
00688             EGS_BaseGeometry::setActiveGeometryList(app_index);
00689             delete geometry;
00690             active_egs_application = app;
00691         }
00692     }
00693     /*
00694     if( a_objects ) {
00695         for(int j=(int)BeforeTransport; j<=(int)AugerEvent; ++j) {
00696             while( a_objects[j].size() ) EGS_Object::deleteObject(a_objects[j].pop());
00697         }
00698         delete [] a_objects;
00699     }
00700     */
00701     if( a_objects ) delete [] a_objects;
00702     if( ghistory ) delete ghistory;
00703     if( active_egs_application == this ) active_egs_application = 0;
00704 }
00705 
00706 void EGS_Application::addAusgabObject(EGS_AusgabObject *o) {
00707     if( !o ) return;
00708     o->setApplication(this);
00709     a_objects_list.add(o);
00710     //int ncall = 1 + (int)AugerEvent;
00711     int ncall = (int)UnknownCall;
00712     if( !a_objects ) a_objects = new EGS_SimpleContainer<EGS_AusgabObject *> [ncall];
00713     for(int call=(int)BeforeTransport; call<ncall; ++call) {
00714         if( o->needsCall((AusgabCall)call) ) {
00715             a_objects[call].add(o); setAusgabCall((AusgabCall)call,true);
00716         }
00717     }
00718 }
00719 
00720 void EGS_Application::initAusgabObjects() {
00721     if( !input ) return;
00722     EGS_AusgabObject::createAusgabObjects(input);
00723     for(int i=0; i<EGS_AusgabObject::nObjects(); ++i)
00724         addAusgabObject(EGS_AusgabObject::getObject(i));
00725 }
00726 
00727 int EGS_Application::finishSimulation() {
00728     //I don't think we need a separate analyzeResults function.
00729     //analyzeResults();
00730     int err = 0;
00731     if( run ) {
00732         err = run->finishSimulation();
00733         if( err < 0 ) return err;
00734     }
00735 
00736     outputResults();
00737     for(int j=0; j<a_objects_list.size(); ++j)
00738         a_objects_list[j]->reportResults();
00739 
00740     if( data_out ) {
00741         delete data_out; data_out = 0;
00742         /*
00743 #ifdef WIN32
00744         string dfile = egsJoinPath(app_dir,run_dir);
00745         dfile = egsJoinPath(dfile,output_file);
00746         dfile += ".egsdat";
00747         string command = "move /Y ";
00748         command += dfile; command += "  "; command += app_dir;
00749         egsInformation("About to execute <%s>\n",command.c_str());
00750         int istat = system(command.c_str());
00751         if( istat ) egsWarning("Failed to move the .egsdat file from the"
00752                " working directory\n");
00753 #endif
00754         */
00755     }
00756     finishRun();
00757     run_dir = "";  // i.e. from now on all output will go to the user code
00758                    // directory.
00759     return err;
00760 }

00762 void EGS_Application::fillRandomArray(int n, EGS_Float *rarray) {
00763     rndm->fillArray(n,rarray);
00764 }
00765 
00766 void EGS_Application::checkDeviceFull(FILE *stream) {
00767 #ifndef WIN32
00768     // quit if space left on disk is less than 1 MB to mitigate disk full problems
00769 
00770     // stat the stream
00771     struct stat tmp;
00772     fstat(fileno(stream), &tmp);
00773 
00774     // check only if the stream is a regular file
00775     if (S_ISREG(tmp.st_mode)) {
00776         struct statvfs fstats;
00777         fstatvfs(fileno(stdout), &fstats);
00778         if (fstats.f_bavail*fstats.f_bsize < 1048576) {
00779             egsFatal("\n\n******** Space left on file system is below 1 MB. Quitting now.\n");
00780             exit(1);
00781         }
00782     }
00783 #endif
00784 }
00785 
00786 void EGS_Application::appInformation(const char *msg) {
00787     if(msg) {
00788         fprintf(stdout,"%s",msg);
00789         fflush(stdout);
00790         checkDeviceFull(stdout);
00791     }
00792 }
00793 
00794 void EGS_Application::appWarning(const char *msg) {
00795     if(msg) {
00796         fprintf(stderr,"%s",msg);
00797         fflush(stderr);
00798         checkDeviceFull(stderr);
00799     }
00800 }
00801 
00802 void EGS_Application::appFatal(const char *msg) {
00803     if(msg) { fprintf(stderr,"%s",msg); fflush(stderr); }
00804     exit(1);
00805 }
